website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a vented brush that is easy to take along when on the go, but it's more comfortable in the hand than it is on the hair.
pros: Features a soft gel-covered handle that makes it easy and comfortable to grip
Smaller size makes it portable and easy to carry in a bag or purse
cons: Bristles are on the stiff side, and have the tendency to pull both wet and dry hair

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Pick Color
customer_reviews.text: i love this briush for really brushing through long tangly hair and for blow drying. My hair doesn't get caught up in the bristles. However, when you purchase this brush be aware that you cannot choose the color. They just send you whatever color they feel like. That's why the 4 stars. I got a color that was not even shown.
customer_reviews.author: CKJames

customer_reviews.title: I’ll have to buy it in a store where I can check the bristles
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very hard, harder than the ones on the brush that I bought it to replace. I was disappointed because I thought I was getting the same brush. The handle on my old brush broke, however, it has more bristles (which are much softer) and does a better job putting my hair into a ponytail. The softer bristles also make it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kelly g.

customer_reviews.title: I'm reviewing a brush....it's that good!
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued by the gel grips on this brush so I decided to try it. I got it yesterday and already love it! The grips make it much easier for my arthritic hand to hold onto and the bristles are sturdy enough to work through any tangles without painful pulling. Brush colors vary, so I didn't know what color my brush would be and I'm very happy with my bright peach brush!
customer_reviews.author: Love 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Best brush.
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than any hairbrush have had. Feels sturdy but not too heavy. Easy to clean. Feels great on hair and scalp. And inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Anne Federico

customer_reviews.title: It is good for naturally curly wet hair that is relatively thin
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this with a hair dryer so can't comment on that. It is good for naturally curly wet hair that is relatively thin. I had to knock the rating down two stars because the bristles catch hairs so tightly, I have trouble pulling them out of the bristles. I might have to go back to my old brush even though it has a crack in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design. Otherwise the brush works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Gel handle causes hair to stick/collect which means you need to constantly clean it off and your hair is constantly getting caught on it while trying to use the brush. Not a great design. Otherwise the brush works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable to style with due to the gel handle. This does get a bit "staticy" if you don't have any product in your hair but it is a great vent brush and I am super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kemph

customer_reviews.title: Simply love the gel grips...
customer_reviews.text: This is one way to get your boys to brush their hair! My guys love squishing the handle. I ordered two, and they came in two different colors, but this was fine with me. One was pink (which my daughter loves!) and the other was white (which the boys love!), so it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Strunc

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: A really great brush. I have really thick hair and need a good brush to get out the tangles and comb through it all. This brush is strong and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This brush is great for people who have long thick hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great for people who have long thick hair. It will go through your hair much better than the oval brushes and the squishy handle keeps your hands comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor family

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the original. I think the beads on the bristles are smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best vent brush I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Great, does what it says and is a bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the gel handle!
customer_reviews.text: The handle on this brush is so cool - easy to grip and comfortable. The vented brush is great for blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: Kittykatarina

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted with one exception - instead of Silver, it is pink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This brush looks and feels great and works when I want to blow dry my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hoffner

customer_reviews.title: Gel Grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice hair brush. Wife loves the gel grip brushes as this isn’t her first one and this one met expectations.
customer_reviews.author: NotoPC26

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: It's a hairbrush. Two exceptional features: 1. No static 2. Cushioned Grip
customer_reviews.author: rhoder

customer_reviews.title: A brush is a brush
customer_reviews.text: Got for my girlfriend who's old Conair brush handle broke (after 10+ years of use). She likes it so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sudduth

customer_reviews.title: The little lady is happy
customer_reviews.text: This is what was requested and this is what I received. And the Missus is happy. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: rePete

customer_reviews.title: So very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the brush in the picture is not what I received. So very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really like this brush
customer_reviews.text: Really like this brush!! Just FYI if your child bites it the jelly stuff is non toxic. (I had to call poison control but they knew the answer!)
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: ... an older version of this brush that has been fantastic. This one is not at all like the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this brush that has been fantastic. This one is not at all like the old one which is not the manufacturers fault, it just is not what i wanted. The bristle are much harder and I actually threw this one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Bob

customer_reviews.title: this one was more like 10 inches
customer_reviews.text: Not the brush I was looking for, I miss judged its size. I wanted a small brush, 6 inches long, this one was more like 10 inches.
customer_reviews.author: James P Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Gel Handle Leakage
customer_reviews.text: The handle grip, gel, leaking out. Very careless, defective design. I will return. This can possibly be a safety, health hazard to small children too. What is the gel made out of?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I & my long haired Significant Other use as a car hairbrush. Works well. Rubberised handle maybe a minus for some. Slightly larger than appears in photos. Would recommend to a friend. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: finger_man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for blow drying
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these forEVER. This brush is gentle on your scalp, and really gets the blow drying done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Decent brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to replace a similar brush I'd been using for close to 10 years! It's not the same brush, but it's a decent replacement. I was expecting silver as pictured, but the one I got was hot pink. I should have read more closely! Works for my hair and the gel handle is really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommended, firm yet gentle brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, daughter liked round version of brush though. My error.Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: I love you,Mommyyyyy aka Meemaw

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in how few bristles it has on it and its little long for my smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: J. De Young

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush, well made and comfortable to use. Beware the color is random.
customer_reviews.author: Will Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brush. I only buy this one because of the grip and strong bristles. I have very curly hair- it makes it though without making my hair frizzy or pulling out the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Bristles too stiff
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. The handle is nice but the bristles are way too stiff. To be fair, most vent brushes have the same problem, but I prefer a vent brush that has a bit of "give" in the bristles. When the bristles bend just a bit on contact with my head, it feels better on the scalp and it styles better, too. Back to the Cricket brushes, even though they don't seem to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Voegelin

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair brush. It seems to stimulate my scalp when brushing and is easy to keep clean. The handle is comfortable in your hand and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: xDebx

customer_reviews.title: My perfect brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long and thick hair. I also have a very tender scalp. This brush has been the best brush I've used. Not only is it comfortable to hold and use, but it doesn't give that staticy feeling that most brushed can give. It also has the vents on the back to help dry my hair as well. I probably have five of these brushes around in different places. I keep one at home, my purse, my car, etc. I can't use any other brush!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT...YOU'LL LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: pERFECT REPLACEMENTS for my sister because her airedale one year old chewed her 2 soft handle grip brushes up! Excellent brushes at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: bugsychipr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great hairbrush but the one I got in the mail was pink not clear....but I love it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The bristles kind of hurt my scalp. I have to be careful with this brush. Good price though.
customer_reviews.author: sundancr123

customer_reviews.title: Great vent brush. Keep away from toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My favorite grip. So glad I found this. Daughter chewed off last one!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for cheap. A couple months in, though, and the goo-filled handle is starting to leak at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Miles

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair brush around. Much easier to order on Amazon than drive to Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! Horrid colour. Delivered colour different from picture!
customer_reviews.text: The hair brush itself is great. But what is not is that I received the hot neon pink colour (which I dislike) and not the nice silver as shown in the picture when I purchased. Now, it is just sitting in my drawer :(
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Brush
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I just wish there were more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Color varies. Mine was pink. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: HeartsInTheSky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The BEST BRUSH!! I LOVE IT. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO EVERYONE....
customer_reviews.author: juliebroz

customer_reviews.title: I like the product - great grip on the handle
customer_reviews.text: I like the product - great grip on the handle. I'm very heartbroken, however, by the fact that I received a pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: I like the brush but hate the boring silver colour I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush but hate the boring silver colour I got. It's frustrating that you can't pick the colour you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Conair Gel Grips Vent Hair Brush, Color May Vary 1 ea
product_meta.description: Style Name:Vent BrushConair gel grips vented brush has a soft gel handle that conforms to the shape of your hand for more control and a comfortable hold. The vented inner core distributes heat evenly for faster drying while helping to prevent over drying and frizz. Vents create better airflow to reach hair on the inside for faster drying and styling. Ball tipped bristles will not snag or pull hair while you work. Use the mid-sized barrel to straighten coarse wavy hair or add soft curls and volume to your hairstyle. Achieve roller style waves while blow drying without the muss and hassle of setting. It's simple and easy to use beauty technology for your best look. Brush color may vary.
feature_bullets: Vented inner core distributes blow dry heat evenly
Vented airflow means faster drying and styling
Soft gel grip conforms to your hand for more control
Ball tipped bristles prevent snags and pulling

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
